statements.query: MATCH (:GCPProject)-[:RESOURCE]->(:GCPServiceAccount)-[:HAS_KEY]->(n:GCPServiceAccountKey) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP IAM Service Account Keys that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPProject)-[:RESOURCE]->(:GCPServiceAccount)-[r:HAS_KEY]->(:GCPServiceAccountKey) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP Project to IAM Service Account Keys relationships that are out of date

name: cleanup GCP IAM Service Account Keys
